column4: I just upgraded from 9.04 to 9.10 from the upgrade manager.. it's cleaned out my lilo.conf file.. any way to retrieve the previous one.. i cant see if it made a backup or not

Ubuntu is never supposed to delete configuration files that have been edited by the user, so it should either still be there or you should be able to generate an identical config file by re-installing lilo ( But I'm still curious why you would do such a thing :)
